scenes.background: Monica nods but looks at Bob, who seems uneasy.
scenes.description: Bob says, I just dont want us to miss an important detail. We should be cautious.

options.text: Bob, your attention to detail is crucial. Let's focus on key points quickly.
options.analysis: You recognize Bob's concern and value his meticulousness while encouraging a more efficient approach.

options.text: I agree with Monica. We need to start immediately, even if some details are overlooked.
options.analysis: You side with Monica, showing decisiveness and motivation but risking lower empathy for Bob's concern.

options.text: Well, it's your call, Bob. We'll follow your lead on this.
options.analysis: You defer to Bob, demonstrating empathy and self-regulation, but potentially slowing progress.
